import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from hyperflow.pipeline.components.preprocessing.operate.split.base import BaseSplit

__all__ = ["SplitNan"]



[docs]class SplitNan(BaseSplit):

[docs]    def calc_R(self, col, rows):
        return np.count_nonzero(pd.isna(col)) / rows


    key1_hp_name = "highR"
    key2_hp_name = "lowR"
    key1_default_name = "highR_nan"
    key2_default_name = "lowR_nan"
